pairingText: Lambrusco Dolce, Port, and Sauternes are great choices for Blue Cheese. Some believe the stinkier the cheese, the sweeter the wine. These dessert wines will be a great match. The Barrel Reserve Port with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 19 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Barrel Reserve Port
productMatches.description: It has a complex richness defined by chocolate and black cherry flavors and aromas, and lengthy oak aging that add spice, vanilla and bold tannins. This velvet smooth port can be enjoyed as a stand-alone dessert or can be perfectly paired with chocolate delights. Serve at 65 degrees F.
